title: Frames Launch: Your Analog Photography Notebook
meta_title: Frames Launch: Your Analog Photography Notebook - Frames
meta_description: Track film photography metadata in the field with iOS and embed EXIF data into scanned images with macOS. Complete analog workflow with 200+ film stocks.
summary: Frames launches as a complete rebuild of Datafilm, bringing a refined iOS app for logging film photography metadata in the field, paired with a new macOS app for embedding that data into your scanned images.

sections.content: Frames is your digital notebook for analog photography, designed to track shot settings and seamlessly integrate metadata into scanned images. Log every detail that matters for each frame: focal length, shutter speed, exposure compensation, aperture, flash settings, camera, lens, film stock, date, time, and geolocation.

sections.alt: Frames film photography app interface for logging analog camera metadata and roll details

items.title: Complete Metadata Logging
items.description: Track frame number, focal length, shutter speed, exposure compensation, aperture, flash settings, camera, lens, film stock, date, time, and location.

items.title: Reference Images
items.description: Attach reference images to each frame for quick visual context when matching scans.

items.title: Interactive Map View
items.description: View your film shots on an interactive map to retrace where each frame was captured.

items.title: Folder Organization
items.description: Organize your film library with folders and powerful search tools to find any frame instantly.

sections.content: The companion macOS app solves the most requested feature from the film photography community: reintegrating metadata into scanned JPEG images. Export your metadata as JSON (.frames) files, share records across Apple devices, and use the macOS app to embed EXIF data that works seamlessly with Lightroom, Capture One, and Apple Photos.

items.title: Adaptive Controls
items.description: Controls adapt to your gear characteristics for faster logging.

items.title: Smart Autofill
items.description: Intelligent autofill for lens, camera, film stock, and ISO saves time in the field.

items.title: 200+ Film Stocks
items.description: Pre-loaded selection of popular film stocks from major manufacturers.

items.title: Native Apple Design
items.description: Follows Apple's Human Interface Guidelines for a smooth, intuitive experience.

items.title: Performance Optimized
items.description: Works smoothly even on older iPhone models.

improvements: Complete ground-up rebuild with refined architecture
Log comprehensive frame metadata: exposure, camera, lens, film, location
Reference image attachment for scan matching
Folder organization for film roll libraries
Powerful search across all logged frames
Interactive map view showing shooting locations
